subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After 13 Premier League titles, five F.A. Cups and the transformation of United into an international sports empire, Alex Ferguson, 71, called it quits as the club’s manager.
snippet: After 13 Premier League titles, five F.A. Cups and the transformation of United into an international sports empire, Alex Ferguson, 71, called it quits as the club’s manager.
